channel.title: OverloadX Server Release + Client [PI]
channel.description:
OverloadX was a large server which lasted for slightly over a month we maxed at around 250 players at one point and over 2.1k votes on mopar and 5.5k on runelocus. Unfortunately bad staff, ddosers, and hackers ruined it. That is the reason I'm now releasing it to the public. OverloadX features a lot of custom and unique content, the server base is PI, and the client is Galkons 474 look alike which both have been heavily modified.
You can download the source and client here: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?inhvbc1l1rt5429]OverloadX.rar[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=H6HU48NO]Mirror[/url]
[SIZE="5"]Info from moparscape page:[/SIZE] [SPOILER="Moparscape"][INDENT][center][img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/8370/bannerlolcopy.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]OverloadX[/b] is a PI server which has been in development for over 2 months! We are a Combat/Skiller type server, and we feature lots of unique content which you won't find in any other server! We have a working vote system, hiscores, lots of bosses, 95% accurate combat formula, pvp, and much more![/size][/center]
[size=12pt][pre][b]OverloadX Features:[/b][/pre][/size]
[ul][li][i] ● Always lots of people online![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Fully working godwars bosses + minions![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Working Highscores![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Working Vote system with misc or cash reward![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Custom training areas[/i][/li] [li][i] ● Pest Control almost 100%![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Duel arena[/i][/li] [li][i] ● Custom PVP (Lumbridge, Falador, and Cammy)[/i][/li] [li][i] ● 95% accurate combat formula, and all weapons specs work and attack correctly![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Custom items such as dragon cape and water cape![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Awesome custom donator area with custom OverloadX only boss npcs with great drops[/i][/li] [li][i] ● KQ 80% accurate[/i][/li] [li][i] ● Custom skiller area and custom OverloadX only tools![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Lots of updated 474+ models and animations!(we are a 317 deob)[/i][/li] [li][i] ● Sexy Custom Interfaces[/i][/li] [li][i] ● Full 100% Skillcapes![/i][/li] [li][i] ● Always new updates, content, and fixes for the server and client![/i][/li][/ul]
[b]Working Chaotic Maul [Hits up to 75], and working Dragon claws! All other weapon specs work 100%![/b] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/8901/28870493.gif[/img][img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/8452/41535019.gif[/img]
[b]100% working Overload Pots[/b] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/7296/54686653.gif[/img]
[b]Active PKing in both Edge, Lumby, and OverloadX Champion![/b] [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/9118/70399430.png[/img] [img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/8615/hybriding.png[/img]
[b]Lots of activity's and a very friendly and active community.[/b] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/2246/allimagescopy.png[/img]
[b]Unique donator packages which give good loot! To see the rest of are donator benfits check out this page [url=http://overloadx.no-ip.org/donate.html][here][/url].[/b] [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/4646/73697884.gif[/img]
[b]Always new updates to are client and server! This is a picture of are V2 client which will be released sometime before X-mas! Also check out a video of it [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z0se8p784c4][here][/url][/b]! [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/2566/58305800.png[/img]
[b][size=5pt]Contact info: [/size][/b] [url=http://s03.flagcounter.com/more/jeO][img]http://s03.flagcounter.com/count/jeO/bg=FFFFFF/txt=000000/border=CCCCCC/columns=5/maxflags=30/viewers=0/labels=1/[/img][/url][/center] [/INDENT][/SPOILER]
To run the source you'll need to disable all of the mysql stuff to get it running, just comment out the Database stuff within server.java, player.java, client.java and enjoy :D
Credits: This guy named Alex i forgot username. 100%

item.title: OverloadX Server Release + Client [PI]
item.dc:creator: @LtoPK LtoPK
item.description:
@LtoPK wrote:

OverloadX was a large server which lasted for slightly over a month we maxed at around 250 players at one point and over 2.1k votes on mopar and 5.5k on runelocus. Unfortunately bad staff, ddosers, and hackers ruined it. That is the reason I’m now releasing it to the public. OverloadX features a lot of custom and unique content, the server base is PI, and the client is Galkons 474 look alike which both have been heavily modified.

You can download the source and client here:
OverloadX.rar
Mirror

[SIZE=“5”]Info from moparscape page:[/SIZE]
[SPOILER=“Moparscape”][INDENT][center]

[size=12pt]OverloadX is a PI server which has been in development for over 2 months! We are a Combat/Skiller type server, and we feature lots of unique content which you won’t find in any other server! We have a working vote system, hiscores, lots of bosses, 95% accurate combat formula, pvp, and much more![/size][/center]

[size=12pt][pre]OverloadX Features:[/pre][/size]

[ul][li] ● Always lots of people online![/li]
[li] ● Fully working godwars bosses + minions![/li]
[li] ● Working Highscores![/li]
[li] ● Working Vote system with misc or cash reward![/li]
[li] ● Custom training areas[/li]
[li] ● Pest Control almost 100%![/li]
[li] ● Duel arena[/li]
[li] ● Custom PVP (Lumbridge, Falador, and Cammy)[/li]
[li] ● 95% accurate combat formula, and all weapons specs work and attack correctly![/li]
[li] ● Custom items such as dragon cape and water cape![/li]
[li] ● Awesome custom donator area with custom OverloadX only boss npcs with great drops[/li]
[li] ● KQ 80% accurate[/li]
[li] ● Custom skiller area and custom OverloadX only tools![/li]
[li] ● Lots of updated 474+ models and animations!(we are a 317 deob)[/li]
[li] ● Sexy Custom Interfaces[/li]
[li] ● Full 100% Skillcapes![/li]
[li] ● Always new updates, content, and fixes for the server and client![/li][/ul]

Working Chaotic Maul [Hits up to 75], and working Dragon claws! All other weapon specs work 100%!

100% working Overload Pots

Active PKing in both Edge, Lumby, and OverloadX Champion!

Lots of activity’s and a very friendly and active community.

Unique donator packages which give good loot! To see the rest of are donator benfits check out this page [here].

Always new updates to are client and server! This is a picture of are V2 client which will be released sometime before X-mas! Also check out a video of it [here]!

[size=5pt]Contact info: [/size]
[/center]
[/INDENT][/SPOILER]

To run the source you’ll need to disable all of the mysql stuff to get it running, just comment out the Database stuff within server.java, player.java, client.java and enjoy

Credits:
This guy named Alex i forgot username. 100%
